body_content.explanation: a long period of time, especially one in which there are new developments and great change:
examples: The president said that his country was moving into a new epoch, which would be one of lasting peace.

body_content.explanation: one of the periods of time in which the history of the earth can be measured, into which an era can be divided:
examples: Scientists discovered remains of woolly mammoths and mastodons believed to be from the Pleistocene epoch, more than 10,000 years ago.
